title: 820-3332 board retina 15" , no ppbus 12.6v, only 1.2v, green light ok
message:
this 820-3332 retina 15" board don't have any ppbus g3h!, green is on, i changed ISL6259 chip, still no luck only 1.2 V in ppbus. also dont see any short to ground

any advice!!!

title: 820-3332 board retina 15" , no ppbus 12.6v, only 1.2v, green light ok
message:
Check resistance of R7005

Check resistance between pins 27/28 of U7000, should be 20.020 ohms

Check resistance between pins 17/18 of U7000, should be 2.2005 ohms

title: 820-3332 board retina 15" , no ppbus 12.6v, only 1.2v, green light ok
message:
wow louis you are seriously smart. it was r7021 and r7022, notw ppbus_g3h is good 12.6 v

now no 5v, rail. , u7201 making 3.3v but no 5v, pin 4 =P5VS4_EN is missing ..... then i found PM_SLP_S5_L is missing.. for missing PM_SLP_S5_L ... what do i chk ? thanks in advance.   which rail power the u1800?? .

title: 820-3332 board retina 15" , no ppbus 12.6v, only 1.2v, green light ok
message: is rtc voltage present? need more hints!

title: 820-3332 board retina 15" , no ppbus 12.6v, only 1.2v, green light ok
message: RTC voltage = PPVRTC_G3_OUT......... Also check R1800-R1803 should have about 3V each side and check SYSCLK_CLK32K_RTC with oscilloscope 32Khz.....
